title: Mazinger ZIP!
synopsis: This is a series of animated flash-shorts produced on NTV's ZIP! television programs starting on April 8, 2013. It is set to replace ZIP!'s previous anime shorts Ohayo Ninja Tai-Gatchaman shorts based on Science Ninja Team Gatchaman. Mazinger ZIP! features the same characters from the original series involved in a series of small comedic sketches. (Source: Mazinger Wiki)
